DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aim determine possible perform acupuncture woman diagnose stable angina symptom . The investigator want determine acupuncture reduces pain symptom angina . The investigator also want examine whether study acceptable participant , carry study investigator able tell many participant need future large study test acupuncture reduce symptom angina woman .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator conduct pilot study aim gather feasibility , acceptability , effect size data randomize control trial ( RCT ) test effect acupuncture anginal symptom woman . The investigator long term goal pain symptom management result improve functional status quality life woman stable angina . This study include 26 community dwell woman medically confirm diagnosis stable angina , whose pain associate symptom completely control guideline-directed medical management . The investigator use randomized attention control design 13 woman assign initial acupuncture 13 control . Participants experimental group receive standardize acupuncture point prescription two treatment per week , 5 week . The attention control group receive non-pain related video health education 5 week equal approximate 10 hour treatment acupuncture group .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : provision verify diagnosis care provider female sex least 21 year age intermittent angina symptom ( pain , pressure , discomfort chest area upper body ) medical confirmation diagnosis stable angina least 6 month Exclusion criterion : pregnancy heart failure COPD causing pain associate symptom autoimmune dysfunction use steroid medication concomitant physical therapy biofeedback massage additional acupuncture
